KnowledgeItem.Title: RemoveSudoUserWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for removing a user from sudoers list by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock RemoveSudoUserWorkflow and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetPath='${RSUW:TargetPath}'
				TargetMachine=${RSUW:TargetMachine}
				TargetState=Created
				User=${RSUW:User}
				Host=${RSUW:Host}
				LinuxUser=${RSUW:LinuxUser}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo deluser ${RSUW:LinuxUser} sudo'
				CurrentState=ReadState
                TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/></NewBlock>
